headline: STE Q2 Deep Dive: Strong Revenue Growth, Segment Momentum, and Guidance Reaffirmed
summary: Medical equipment and services company Steris (NYSE:STE). reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.7% year on year to $1.39 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.34 per share was 3.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: STE Q2 Deep Dive: Strong Revenue Growth, Segment Momentum, and Guidance Reaffirmed
content.summary: Medical equipment and services company Steris (NYSE:STE). reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.7% year on year to $1.39 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.34 per share was 3.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
